website_summaries.verdict: Affordable test that is simple to use with a fast turnaround.
pros: The test is ISO compliant and has full accreditation
You can check the status and results of the test online
cons: The results of this test cannot be used in court

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for my stupid husband.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy. Lab tests included in the price. My husband is an idiot and he was able to do this test on our 3 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WORKS!!!!!!. My husband just found out his 10 year old daughter is in fact NOT his daughter and we confronted the mother and she told the truth!!!!!! The shipping was quick and instructions were very easy! We had our results within a week. I don’t care who you pray to, but pray for us please.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Results....
customer_reviews.text: It's been over 6wks and still have NOT relieved the results !!! I feel we've wasted 100$ . My son has left several emails and NO RESPONSE from them. Wasted money 😣
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! 100% worth the price. I got it primed to my house and sent it out next day (I expedited shipping so it got to be lab next day. They texted me saying they received my samples and that the results would be ready in 2 days. They then texted me telling me my results were ready online on the day they promised! So happy and now have a piece of mind!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My main concern was confidentiality. Walking into an office just wasn’t going to do it. My situation was one of the rare ones. My partner hadn’t had a child in over 40yrs! The doubt, the anxiety, my fear of not knowing for certain was the hardest part. I googled DNA test, STK happened to be one of the top rated. With a budget, short time frame, I followed my gut instinct. My samples arrived two days after I mailed them, two days later I received my results. I can honestly say customer service was top priority!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy & quick
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this test kit. I received it promptly, it was very simple to administer and return and got the results back very promptly. It included everything it said and its a one fee test. Very satisfied with the simplicity and time frames, obviously when doing a test like this we were anxious to get the results back so the promptness of arrival and results were much appreciated
customer_reviews.author: KRIS A KING

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were simple and clear. Results arrived in a timely manner. Had to get a $400 court-admissible test weeks later, and they used the exact same testing center as this product, so I feel like it’s a trustworthy service.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: I liked that this test was done in private at home. It gave confirmation to my son, it was his son.
customer_reviews.text: This test was really easy. I wanted a confirmation my grandson had the same DNA as my son. It was as quick as order, swab their mouths and send the kit back in their provided envelope. I registered the kit online and 5 days I had my results. The best part was it was convenient, private, and a confirmation of what we hoped was true.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother while dealing with his ex and the results were accurate and my brother was very happy with the ease of use of the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my husband could see if a young lady was his daughter. Sadly she wasn't. This came with easy to follow instructions and accuracy was great.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Test like this much IMPORTANT needs separate CAPSULES for each Swaps!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wished that they have separate capsules to protect from contamination because after taking swap I have to worry about they may contaminated because you envelopes get WET & return envelopes are all in one ! even separated with envelopes they going in ONE envelope to return! For $100 they should do better ! Test like this IMPORTANT needs extra equipment & care !
customer_reviews.author: Halzaa

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very fast results! After 9 mos of my ex-husband getting pestered by "friends" about the parentage of our son (biracial but he's very fair with gray eyes), he finally caved and requested a paternity test. The instructions were very clear and, despite inclement weather which delayed the shipment, very fast. Within a week of ordering the test, we had confirmation of what I already knew, he's the father!
customer_reviews.author: Megytron

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Fast and precise results
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Fast and precise results. Saved step-son from decades and tens of thousands of dollars raising another man's child!
customer_reviews.author: NoRelation

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast results!
customer_reviews.text: Came with easy to follow instructions. Loved the text updates when it was received by the lab and when results were in. I would recommend this for a easy, fast, private way to get DNA results.
customer_reviews.author: ebarker

customer_reviews.title: Over a month and still no results
customer_reviews.text: bought this, register it and than sent in my cotton swap sample to the lab (in the included envelope). its been over a month and still no results. and like everyone else says.. the 800 ain't much help. Save yourself time and money and go with 23andme or ancestrydna edit: its been 3 Months now, tried calling their 800 number on dnacenter.com for TWO hours (i didn't reach anyone) and yes i call during business hours. tried emailing.. no response.. at this point i give up.. i'm just going to order ancestrydna, more expensive but at least i was able to reach someone to answer my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this Paternity test to others
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Would recommend this Paternity test to others, simple to do and easy to read results.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product - directions are super easy to follow. I placed the swabs with the DNA in the provided envelop and in less than the anticipated date, the results arrived via email. Results are comprehensive and easy to understand. Don't waste your time and money with other services, STK is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ilicha

customer_reviews.title: Easier to do cheek swab while the baby slept.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to do it without the mother knowing. Results gave me the piece of mind I needed, I had even considered a prenatal DNA test with myself and the other potential father splitting the high cost. Test results showed up online quickly and were easy to interpret.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This company is legit, fast and results were accurate!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth your money! Im glad I read the reviews so I knew exactly what to expect. I received the product fast. The instructions were very easy to follow. I would recommend allowing your samples to dry before putting them in the return envelopes so they don't wet the envelope. My samples were received by the lab on Thursday and I had my results by Monday! Def recommend this company!!
customer_reviews.author: shenalle philip

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind - Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After a communications hiccup with an IVF lab that caused us serious concern, we used this kit to verify our child's genetic identity. The process was quick and seamless, and now we know with 500-million-to-one certainty that our child is truly ours. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Quality priduct
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and simple easy to read instructions. I thought the reaponse time was very good with the results
customer_reviews.author: C. Genovese

customer_reviews.title: yeo make sure you save all material that its shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: yeo make sure you save all material that its shipped with otherwise they charge an exra 35
customer_reviews.author: locious

customer_reviews.title: Great service, fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are very straightforward and they have excellent live support for any questions you might have. Quick, discreet and painless way to collect the samples, good for "undercover" missions. The results came in even faster than the minimum amount of days they stated it would take. 99.999% confident I`m a father now, the peace of mind is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: test for father and "son"
customer_reviews.text: After tips in mouths of father and "son" and put the tips in envelope and noticed wet shows through envelopes. This caused me to wonder how can they test the DNA if both wet envelopes
customer_reviews.author: art

customer_reviews.title: Extremely simple
customer_reviews.text: Shipment came fast. Real easy to use. Results came quickly. Completely satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fast results!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have asked for more. I received my kit, it was easy to use and I had the results back in less than a week from the date that I mailed it....actually received the results on a Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: TRVLR

customer_reviews.title: It was easy.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and simple. You can add more than one child to the initial test, but I didn't realize it at first. Getting in touch with customer service is challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Battousai

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Quick results. The website was a pain though because it wouldn't let me enter the code. I had to call customer service and they resolved the problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this test.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Very happy with the results too. Please read all the paperwork before using and make sure you register the product when you get it. If you have any questions, just call customer support and they will help. I did...
customer_reviews.author: Rico Towers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The process was easy to complete and the results were provided quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Joyce

customer_reviews.title: will recommended STK home dna paternity test to anyone who needs ...
customer_reviews.text: will recommended STK home dna paternity test to anyone who needs to have it done. It was very easy and really fast. I purchased the kit on Thursday,did the mouth swab and fedex in the afternoon, Friday morning STK got it. I got my test results on Tuesday afternoon. the results were not the expected. so I went to a local lab and have test redone, at a much higher price. the results were exactly the same. so from my own experience the test is very reliable. don't waste your money in expensive test. at the end all of them are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Wickedumb

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Forgot about writing this. But I remember now. I'm very satisfied. This is exactly what i expected and the customer service has been stellar. I know I'm not gushing, but what else is needed to be said? - Received the kit. - Followed the instructions. - Mailed it back. - Got my results online within days. (I'm a father now BTW). This isn't a court admissible DNA test, it's just for peace of mind (a fact that is not hidden as they also have a court admissible version) and that's what I have now. No complaints at any step in the process. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very professional. Saved me 18 years. Follow instructions closely. Comes with its own return mailing label but I decided to ship it in an expedited envelope with their pre paid envelope and contents inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Quick Results
customer_reviews.text: The test was simple and easy to use. The instructions we able to be followed without issue. The only small criticism I would have is the use of paper packaging without any barrier between the receptacle envelops. We faced the samples in opposite directions for mailing, but it felt like they could easily be contaminated. I imagine there is a scientific reason behind why they use the materials they do, but it was worrisome at the time. Despite that, we had our answer within 2 business days of it arriving at their facilities. If you're needing it to arrive sooner than 7-10 days, I suggest paying for expedited shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Solid Test
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to use. Good to know the truth!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dent

customer_reviews.title: Check accuracy of this test.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think the test was accurate, there’s to many similarities between me and my possible daughter.
customer_reviews.author: stephen podunajec

customer_reviews.title: The best testing available
customer_reviews.text: High quality test plus a smooth customer service operation. This test is very easy to use. Comes w w step by step directions. The process is very fast and notifies you as soon as results are ready. The results are highly informative. You are give a clear answer on your results as well as being given the complete break down of DNA alleles in each sample.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Morse

customer_reviews.title: Reommend!
customer_reviews.text: Results were fast, not as fast as other reviews that I read, however still had results within a week time frame. I also paid for the overnight fee/amount, although it seemed they did not receive my kit for 4 days. i don't recommend spending the extra money to overnight it. Seemed very accurate. I read a lot of other tests before choosing this one. Directions are easy to follow, and easy to do. just register product, swab, let dry, place in envelope, seal, have the third party sign and mail.
customer_reviews.author: KT2

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the purchase of this test. STK sends this test to DDC (DNA Diagnostics Center). DDC sent an email saying they received the test. About 1 week later, I was emailed the results. The results only have our case number on it. Not the names of the potential father and child. It's easy to use. I highly recommend this test for anyone who needs a peace of mind! Oh yeah & the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use DNA kit.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly. As the other person to be tested was in Florida (Other in Michigan) one set of swabs was done here and the remaining kit sent to Florida where the test was completed. The Florida party then used the enclosed envelope to send both swab packages for testing. The results were available on line in about one week. Note: If you try to log on to get results prior to the test being completed, it will not recognize you.. no biggie. The results are easy to interpret and there is assistance if needed. I did some research and this came out ahead.. I recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Reliable results. You can even set up text alerts so you get info ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions; everything needed included in original purchase; online results accessibility worked well. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: J Gray

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and I'm very pleased with the results!
customer_reviews.author: N. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Fast And Easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the answer that I already knew! But it put other's minds at ease. Thanks! This product really does work and I got the results FAST!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you just need vefication because you know the old adage "Momma's baby, Daddy's maybe"; & in this day and age, it never hurts to be thorough. At any rate, we used this kit for piece of mind, but could have easily upgraded to 'legally acceptable for court' which is good; Performing the test is easy & so is registration. We picked up the results online which is very convenient. I would reccomend this product to anyone who needs piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: LadyMun

customer_reviews.title: Quick results
customer_reviews.text: The kit procedure was simple to follow, and the results were speedy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: It works, no customer service on weekends
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast results. Had a problem using the code that was sent to mail in the product and had to wait until Monday (it was late Fri) before we could call customer service. But other than that one little snafu, we received a definitive answer in about 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: no_deadbeats

customer_reviews.title: Get Results!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use and a reasonable price. I had to email costumer service because we screwed up. They sent another text for free! We did the 2nd one correctly and sent it in. Got our results within the time it said. All was great. I would buy another test from them.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfslolo

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Results
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the results were accurate. The results were returned in a short period of time. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jana B

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: Got the results in two business days - sent it in on Saturday- results in that Tuesday. They are accurate because the father did another court order test since I sent him to child support. Same results / easy to use
customer_reviews.author: blanca

customer_reviews.title: Fast, efficient, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Very easy to use. Sent it in with the prepaid envelope they provided. A couple of days later I was notified that they had received my samples and less than 10 days later I had the results. Fast, efficient, affordable. I absolutely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: HE IS THE DADDY!
customer_reviews.text: This test was easy to do. The directions were very easy to follow. The results were ready so fast. I’m very happy with this test and would purchase again. Now everyone knows what I already knew. “HE IS THE DADDY” 😃
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to prove or disprove ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit shipped quickly, it was received at the lab quickly and results were back to me in a week. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to prove or disprove paternity!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hurt

customer_reviews.title: It took a little while longer because when the DDC ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while longer because when the DDC received the samples, they never sent me a notification and I called and had to verify birth dates for them. Stk did their job though and answered questions very quickly when I emailed them for information.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rogers

customer_reviews.title: He’s the dad
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. His saliva went through the envelope for his dna but it didn’t seem to affect the test at all as it came back with him being the dad of course. The test was sent and results given really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: courteney

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Got it the next day, send it in and got my results 2weeks later. Easy and fast, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: otilia b.

customer_reviews.title: Quick results, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Shipped my test last Tuesday (2/19), got a text Friday (2/22) that it was received and results would be due the following Tuesday (2/26). Results came in a day early (today, 2/25). Unfortunately not the results we wanted but at least now we know.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this paternity test after reading such good reviews. It was very simple to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this paternity test after reading such good reviews. It was very simple to use and the directions were easy to follow. Got the results back in a very timely manner. If I ever needed to use a test again I would use this company.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA GOODALE

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Got the results we wanted. One time fee. It had options for having the results come fster to you. I believe its like 40$ fee. On top of everythin i really recommend this one. No gimmicks with this. Cannot go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Judge others

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: I mailed it in on a Monday and by Friday I knew who my dad was. It took 41 years but we know now. It was easy and very fast A+ !!
customer_reviews.author: Holly McCoy

customer_reviews.title: He needs to put a ring on it ladies. Orrrr he gets NO cookie! Keep yo legs closed!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that the only man I slept with had doubt, when she looks like he pooped her out his butt. Liked the quick results, 4 days after the swabs got back to the lab. As Maury says "When it comes to 3 month old Winnie.... He IS the father!"
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Easy detailed results
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10 days for USPS to deliver to lab. Results sent via email link 2 days after lab received. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never received results, no one ever answers the phone. I have called time and time again. Stayed on hold for 45 minutes last time I called, and no one ever answers. It’s been a month since I sent it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly j.

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use should include a tube to send back dna sample
customer_reviews.author: TONY & Talisha

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this test and had to end up getting one done directly through DDC a couple months later due to people thinking this test was fake..BUT EVERYTHING was the exact same on the test. IT WORKS
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than the estimated time. Follow the directions closely and there won't be a problem with the swabs dampening the envelopes. I used a carrier service(fed ex/ ups) to speed up the return of the swabs back to the lab. The directions say seven days from time of swab. Clear easy to read online results.
customer_reviews.author: jamar d. foster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service from stk answered all my questions/concerns made ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service from stk answered all my questions/concerns made me a very happy customer..test was easy got the results i wanted..would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: Write down the confirmation number!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave me the results I needed. Took forever to get results back because I didn't right down the confirmation number at registration. Test processed in 3 days results in 21 days.
customer_reviews.author: MJ_1981

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service. No results. No money back.
customer_reviews.text: Takes 40 minutes on the phone to speak to someone. And then the hang up on you. No results after over two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Why does the website no work?
customer_reviews.text: I go to Register and the website is down, What is that bull XD, Edit: So they use a whole different company than what is advertise on box and uses DDC Not some SterlingTek, While you have to send a copy of purchase because they don"t Use the registration key on Box and a whole different website than that on the box,
customer_reviews.author: admiringsquash

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. 😊
customer_reviews.text: Helped my husband find his 25 year old son. Test was accurate and we knew results in one week. Very happy. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jean Meek

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, they wanted additional money for the test I wanted done and I refused to pay for it. I did give them an additional star for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful turn around time
customer_reviews.text: We got the answers we were hoping for. Wonderful turn around time
customer_reviews.author: Corrie T.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the satisfaction of knowledge.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this test twice now and have had great results. I followed the instructions as stated. Got results in a very timely manner. They notify you when they receive the kit. Then again when results were posted. It's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were very simple and easy to follow. I got my results in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use. We got results back in the time specified and results were easy to read. Helped ease any questions we had and life is grand.
customer_reviews.author: Malerie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Tracking updates and fast, affordable results make this a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: It is important for you to register and used email
customer_reviews.text: This is really accurate and I got results back with it 3 days. Make my live better cheap and works 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: celia alvarado

customer_reviews.title: The truth
customer_reviews.text: This broke my heart ... but everything went perfect as expected !
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Montufar

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, no issues. Got results back in a timely manner. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M

customer_reviews.title: Speedy turn around time
customer_reviews.text: The test kit arrived quickly with easy to follow instructions. I put the swabs in the mail and within a week I had discovered I had a new 12 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, Quick, and worth the money. Nice to know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use; able to upgrade to get results faster; results given when promised; reliable; easy to get in touch with
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dusanic

customer_reviews.title: I’m giving one star because 0 is not an option ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving one star because 0 is not an option. The first kit we got a notice that they required recollection because of not enough dna. And the second test came back incorrect. I am the mother and there is ZERO chance that he is not the father but the test came back 0%. Another dna test proved he is the father. Don’t use this company!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Soucy

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results and easy to use. Very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit, received it promptly, very easy to use. Sent it off and got the results in a couple weeks. Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: adam hanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The results were accurate and very comforting to receive!!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Q

customer_reviews.title: Follow each step as instructed and you will be fine .
customer_reviews.text: I give this product five stars follow each step as instructed and you will surely get the results you’ve been wanting In a timely matter.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony clay

customer_reviews.title: Paternity at home
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to get ahold of lab multiple time with no answer. I tried email and phone with no luck!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a peace of mind, this ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a peace of mind, this will def help. I sent in my swabs last Monday and got results the following Thursday!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and cheap for what it's worth to know
customer_reviews.author: eric wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to do and got my answer in a few
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to do and got my answer in a few days
customer_reviews.author: JOAN SCHUM

customer_reviews.title: Quick and painless. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to use. Great price and even better results! If I needed to use one again I would definitely buy this kit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no muss no fuss. I only wish I had noticed it would not be admissable in court.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sipes Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy and discrete! Results fast via online and very happy with our results!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Just do it already
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and gives you the answers you’re looking for
customer_reviews.author: mrocha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! quick and easy- fast online results that are easy to understand!
customer_reviews.author: Kate I

customer_reviews.title: She’s mine!
customer_reviews.text: We found out that my grand daughter is 99.9996 % related to my son!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy, accurate. Arrived in two days with Prime, three days returning to the lab and I had the results one day after being notified the swabs had been received.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Results were clear
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an STK paternity test and it arrived with clear instructions. I did have a problem with registration in trying to order a hard copy of the test results. After several attempts, I put the registration through without the additional request for hard copy. It could be that I was registering on my phone. The test results were fairly clear. I had not read the time allotment properly on how long it would take to have my results processed so I thought the wait was a little long. Once received, it was concise and easily understood.
customer_reviews.author: PeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great service and test results came as promised. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

product_meta.title: STK's Paternity Test Kit - Includes All LAB FEES and Free Return Mailer for 99.999% Accurate 2-Person Testing
product_meta.description: STK Home Paternity Test INCLUDES ALL LAB FEES for testing a suspected father and child. The kit includes a Free Return Mailer. The test is up to 99.999% accurate and if additional legally binding paternity testing is required discounts are available. The STK Home Paternity Test is delivered to your door and includes swabs for gathering samples and a mailer for sending the genetic material back to the lab. The DNA testing lab is based in the USA and the paternity test samples are tested within hours of when they arrive by mail. Paternity testing takes 3-5 business days and status reports and results are available online. If you have questions about the paternity test result a 1-800 number is available. You will be able to print a copy of the paternity test results as soon as they are available online. A full color copy of the paternity test results is available to you by mail. The STK/SterlingTek name images and contents of this STK listing are protected by trademarks and copyrights.
feature_bullets: All Lab Costs are Included for 1 suspected father and 1 child, all tests are ISO 17025 compliant
Paternity tests verify 16 DNA loci 3 more than the FBI for DNA Fingerprints
Online status and results are available and a color hard copy of results will be mailed
Professional and Confidential and a 1-800 number is available for questions
All Paternity Tests are 99.999% accurate, less than 1 chance in a 100,000 for a false positive
